name: The Barnkeeper (HealingStorm)
description:
Here is a group project we have made in 7 months with 3 Game Artists and 3 Game Designers (including me !) and a Sound Designer. I introduce to you "The Banrkeeper", a game where you play as a former female slave called Renée, who escaped an exploitation during the American civil war in 1862. You get trapped in a mysterious barn where you will have to find the exit while being hunted by a monster. Throughout the game you will discover the truth about what was going on in this barn...

This game takes about 20 min to complete if you're playing normally.

Controls :

Move - Z, Q, S, D

Lantern - A

Interact - E

Climb - F

Inventory - TAB

Pause - Escape

Credits :

Game Artists :

- Clothilde Arlaut https://itch.io/profile/clothilde-arlaut

- Théo Durand https://itch.io/profile/theo-durand

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PilotRoxane

Have fun playing it !
